A ranging potion is a potion found in the Last Man Standing minigame. A dose of ranging potion provides a temporary skill boost to Ranged equal to 4 + 10% of the player's current Ranged level, rounded down. Unlike normal ranging potions, these lack an "Empty" option.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Ranged boost is calculated with: ⌊ R a n g e d L e v e l × 1 10 ⌋ + 4 {\displaystyle \lfloor RangedLevel\times {\frac {1}{10}}\rfloor +4}

Level Boost Level Boost
1-9 +4 50-59 +9
10-19 +5 60-69 +10
20-29 +6 70-79 +11
30-39 +7 80-89 +12
40-49 +8 90-99 +13
v • d • e

A '''ranging potion''' is a [[Herblore#Potions|potion]] found in the [[Last Man Standing]] [[minigame]]. A  dose of ranging potion provides a [[temporary skill boost]] to [[Ranged]] equal to 4 + 10% of the player's current Ranged level, rounded down. Unlike normal [[ranging potion]]s, these lack an "Empty" option.

==Effects==
Ranged boost is calculated with: <math>\lfloor RangedLevel \times \frac{1}{10} \rfloor + 4</math>
